response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's worth and your perceived value, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
